Name: Cope Island: Adrift
About the game: Formerly the Third Place Winner of the Indie Game Maker Contest 2014's RPG section, Cope Island returns rebuilt from scratch and better than ever. COPE ISLAND Happy or sad. When one is faced with a desire to better themselves they are drawn to Cope Island. Take a limited amount of randomized weapons and battle your way through a series of trials in order to have a showdown with Your Demon. There are a number of possible weapon combos you may find per visit. Cope Island is full of secrets and it is up to you to stay on track or break your way through the forgotten. Take the plunge. Discover one's self. FEATURES Fast-Paced Turn-Based Battles Rogue-Lite Elements Multiple Branching Paths All Original Pixel Art All Original Music
